config.customcongratsoundforcobblemon.vi: Volume for victory music after winning battles (0.0 - 1.0)
config.customcongratsoundforcobblemon.ev: Volume for congratulations music after evolution completes (0.0 - 1.0)
config.customcongratsoundforcobblemon.ca: Volume for congratulations music when catching Pokemon (0.0 - 1.0)
config.customcongratsoundforcobblemon.en: Enable victory music after winning battles
Enable congratulations music after Pokemon evolution
Enable congratulations music when catching Pokemon
config.customcongratsoundforcobblemon.vi: How long victory music plays in milliseconds (default: 7000 = 7 seconds)
config.customcongratsoundforcobblemon.de: Enable debug logging for troubleshooting (check console logs)
